Google Lens Translate Online  - Chrome Extension Overview
The Google Lens Translate Online (100% Free) Chrome extension is a simple and powerful tool that allows you to quickly translate selected text on any webpage. With just a right-click, you can easily translate text into over 30 different languages, including English, Spanish, Hindi, Bengali, Chinese, and more. This extension is designed to make your browsing experience smoother by helping you understand foreign languages without leaving the page. Itâ€™s free, easy to use, and perfect for anyone who needs quick translations while surfing the web.

ðŸ”´ Disclaimer:

The Google Lens Translate Online (100% Free) extension provides translations through a third-party service, which means the accuracy of the translations may vary depending on the complexity and context of the text. While we strive to ensure privacy and security, users should be cautious when translating sensitive or confidential information, as it involves sending data to an external server for processing. Additionally, this extension is completely free to use, with no hidden fees or in-app purchases, making it a convenient tool for users who need quick translations without any cost.
